#summary Requirements intended for the version 2.0 of Regex-Renamer
#labels Phase-Requirements

= Introduction =

This page shows a list of requirements intended to be implemented on the version 2.0 of Regex-Renamer


= Details =

  * New user interface
    * New Tango project iconset
  * Option for renaming all files listed, selected or based on regex expression
  * Small changes on the replace language
  * Auto complete - postponed for the next version
  * Replace Colours
    * Black -> No Match
    * Blue -> Match
    * Red -> Filename conflict
  * Progress bar on rename execution - postponed for the next version
    * Display summary after rename
  * Refresh contents after rename
